jobDescription: Essential Functions and Key Responsibilities:Processing of optoelectronic devices.Prime duties include but not limited to: Processing of micro-electronics and micro-mechanical systems in a wafer fab environment.Duties may also include processing wafers through various production and measurement tools in Die FAB Operations.This can include: handling wafers, loading/unloading wafers, selecting tool programs, selecting recipes, and performing analytic measurements to determine if the process is in control.Education & Experience Necessary For Success: High School Diploma or Higher Infinera is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, sex, age, status as a protected veteran, or status as a qualified individual with disability. EEO Employer/Vet/Disabled.
